document_data.name: ''Ring of Electra''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''ring of Electra''''' was a powerful [[enchanted]] [[ring]] that allowed the wearer to discharge lightning out of their fingers.
document_data.Description: The ''ring of Electra'' was a small band of [[electrum]].
document_data.Powers: This ring allowed the wearer to cast the ''[[lightning bolt]]'' spell at will. It possessed six charges.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], the ''ring of Electra'' and its sister item, the ''[[wand of Electra]]'', could be found in the [[Cult of the Dragon]]-controlled upper levels of [[Eleven Catacombs]] underneath [[Castle Cormanthor]]. Each of the enchanted items was placed in a chest on the opposite rooms of a small healing alcove. Each room was guarded by several [[skeleton]] lords who came to life and attacked anyone who was bold enough to steal elven treasures.
